name: Game Day Chili Pups
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: Tailgating or checking out the game at home, these mini chili pups are smoky, spicy and delicious. Great for snacking before the touchdown.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies® Smoked Sausage
directions: Cut thawed dough into 36 to 40 one-inch pieces
Roll each piece into a small oval shape and place on a parchment-lined baking sheet
Cover with greased plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size
Whisk egg with 1 teaspoon water and gently brush the tops of each roll
In a skillet over medium-high heat, cook Lit'l Smokies smoked sausages until browned
At the same time, heat chili in a saucepan over medium heat until hot
Cut each roll in half down the top, not cutting all the way through
Place a smoked sausage into each roll, top with a spoonful of chili and garnish with cheddar cheese, onion and jalapenos
